content.text:
# Dwarka metro station

| image              = File:Dwarka Metro.JPG
| address            = Dwarka, Delhi, 110078
| coordinates        =

| line               =
| platform           = 5
| tracks             = 5

| bicycle            = 100
| accessible         = Yes

| opened             =
| closed             =
| rebuilt            =
| electrified        =  through overhead catenary
| former             =
| mpassengers        = 800000
| passengers         = 600000
| pass_system        =
| pass_year          = 2005
| pass_percent       =
| services           =

| smartcardname      =

| mapframe           = yes
| mapframe-marker    = rail
| mapframe-marker-color =
| mapframe-zoom      = 14

The Dwarka metro station is located on the Blue Line and Grey Line of the Delhi Metro. The Station is an interchange station between the lines. Some of the Metro Services terminate here of the blue line.

Facilities
List of available ATM at Dwarka metro station are Oriental Bank of Commerce, State Bank of India.
